short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and organize your internet resources

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save and organize everything you discover online with the Keplr Chrome extension. Connected to Keplr.in, the web's largest community-driven knowledge library, this extension makes it easy to collect, organize, and share valuable internet resources.

Key Features:
• Save anything interesting you find online with just one click
• Create custom collections for different topics or interests
• Share your collections with friends, colleagues, or the world
• Access curated resources from industry experts across various domains
• Discover collections from thousands of other users

Perfect for:
• Professionals collecting work resources
• Students gathering study materials
• Hobbyists saving inspiration
• Anyone who wants to organize their online discoveries

Join thousands of users who are already using Keplr to build and share their personal knowledge libraries. Whether you're researching for work, collecting inspiration, or just saving interesting finds, Keplr helps you keep everything organized and accessible.

Part of the Keplr.in ecosystem, where hundreds of industry experts contribute their knowledge and curated collections daily. Build your own digital library and become part of a growing community of knowledge sharers!

Free to use. Install now and start building your personal internet library!
